This game is crap. Broken hit boxes, broken animations, toxic community, etc. this list goes on and on and on and on and on. I love this game if you couldn't tell 8/10 you should totally get it.

Do you want to know what to expect with DbD? Well step right up, I'm about to tell you!

Every update will break your game. I'm not exaggerating either. If you can actually get into the game you will see glitches galore! Oh, and texturing issues. Oh, and don't forget the random lagging. Oh oh, I almost forgot... EaC issues! Corrupt files! A LOT. Or... OR! You may be gifted with a game crash that you get penalized for, because that's only fair you know! But never fear - your friends will experience the same thing so you don't feel alone.

Do you not have friends and want to play solo? Good luck! The new grading system is so whack that newbies will be put up with elite players that will bully them and end up dying on first hook because the new players are too scared to try and save. I really wish I could say something good about their MMR, but it's just really really bad. I'm sorry....

Do you want fun events that give you something super interesting to do?? Well you may want to look elsewhere. The tome challenges can be entertaining, but are basically objectives you always do anyway. In the past there were events with really neat looking lanterns, gen decorations, etc. The newer events try to compete, but they really just can't. 

Oh and last but not least.... NFTs. This dev sucks for that.

----

Okay I've ragged on it enough. If you want a game to play with friends this game is really fun. We have a great time, when we can all play.  You'll scream and laugh and have an all around great time. That is the biggest positive of this game. It does take some skill, but once you get the hang of it you'll have an awesome time and feel like you've accomplished something - win or lose.
O jogo é brabo demais!
This is the best current "horror" game on steam. Every match has a different experience for you to enjoy and each killer gives a new experience to test out.

KOX

I bought this game when it was on sale because two of my friends play it, and I have just over 70 hours. I know that's not a lot for some people, but it's definitely the most time I have spent playing a game. Anyways, Killer is a little hard to play because sometimes matchmaking fails at its job, and there are a few bugs, but there are so many more pros. There are loads of characters with different perks to choose from, archive challenges that unlock little stories of the characters, and it's exciting when you win a chase in low ranks. This is definitely my favourite game on steam right now.

Ez egy nagyon jó játék. Szórakoztató. Csak drága. Ha úgy nézzük hogy az alap játék ára 19.99 plussz dlc-k. Nem is ez a drága hanem a pass benne. Szerintem egy fizetős játékhoz képest lehetne egy picivel olcsóbb a pass. mondjuk a kb 3400 forintos ára (9.99 dolcsi) helyett kerülhetne felében. De ha ezt nem nézzük akkor is rohadt jó játék.  Mindenféle képpen érdemes megvásárolni.
Gud game

Apesar de sua "idade de lançamento" e inúmeros updates, ainda pode-se notar diversos bugs e até mesmo alguns exploits tanto jogando de survivor como de killer.
O sistema de balanceamento é praticamente inexistente, um time de survivors rank 20 (o mais baixo, no caso) e um killer rank 3, por exemplo, irá acontecer com frequência.
Outro defeito é a ausência de um season pass para as dlc's, pagar o preço integral em conteúdo adicional toda season nova apenas pra ter acesso a um killer e um survivor não vale a pena.

O que gosto no jogo é o sistema de progressão de perks e as builds que podem ser montadas para fazer counter-play em praticamente qualquer killer.
Recomendo que jogue com uma party fechada, para ter uma melhor experiência.

Por mais que eu tenha só 13 horas aqui, no ps4 eu tenho umas 1000 horas ou mais, o que eu quero falar aqui é que mesmo no ps4 tem pessoas tóxicas, não é só no pc que os players iniciantes são prejudicados.
A comunidade de dbd é muito tóxica e todo mundo sabe disso mas vou te dar uma dica, apenas feche o chat se não quiser se estressar, os players mais experientes transmitiram essa toxicidade a outros players e assim foi indo, eu sei que é difícil não ligar pra teabag, piscadas de lanterna ou etc, não dê bola pra isso porque sério se você jogar estressado você nunca vai jogar bem.
Se virem te xingar apenas feche o chat, falando do dbd em geral agora, é um jogo bugado e todo mundo sabe, temos muitas atualizações mas alguns bugs continuam, a hitbox é um absurdo, ás vezes a machadinha da huntress te acerta a 2 metros de você.
E sim o jogo é pay to win, já que você precisa comprar a Laurie Strode com dinheiro real pra pegar o ds e comprar alguns killers como Leatherface pra pegar o barbecue e etc. 
Os personagens são muito caros se você quer comprar com dinheiro do jogo, tipo você tem que jogar muito mas muito mesmo e infelizmente tem os licenciados que só podem ser comprados com dinheiro real.
Enfim o jogo sempre foi assim e nunca vai mudar, essa comunidade vai continuar assim e o jogo vai continuar lançando 30 mil expansões e deixando alguns bugs de lado, por isso pra você continuar jogando dbd você tem que ser guerreiro.

А игра 7/10.   RECOMMEND

I deleted my old review, since that was more first impressions than a review. However, I still stand by most of what I have written back then.

I will start by saying that I continue playing DbD primarily because the game, despite everything, is very addicting, has no real competition and... I've already bought several DLCs, so I'm kind of invested in it.

After 200 hours of playing (at the time of this re-review) I would still not recommend this game to anyone.
- The grind is insane. Not only are the best Perks (basic method of adjusting your potential) locked behind characters you have to buy with IRL money or grind even more with Iridescent Shards (currency awarded for playing in general), once you unlock the chars, you have to farm literal millions of Bloodpoints (currency awarded for playing matches) to a) unlock the Perks as teachables on these chars and b) then unlock them on the other characters you want to have these Perks. This takes dozens of hours.
- The matchmaking is basically non-functional. It is so bad, that it matches total newbies with veterans with thousands of hours. It would be better if it was totally random. No joke.
- The balance is laughable. While balancing a 4v1 game is hard, the DbD team seems as though it does not even try. To go into detail would entail an entire thesis going over Perks, palette placement, tile spawns, killer powers etc. And guess what? It was EVEN WORSE when it came out back in 2016. Balance was a mountain of garbage. Now it's just a pile of garbage. With this rate of improvement, the game should be more or less balanced around 2025.
- The performance and bugs. People with RTX 3080 have problems with FPS on some of the graphically improved maps. Let that sink in. Also, each patch introduces more and more bugs, but that is kind of a given in a multiplayer game these days.
- The community can be incredibly toxic. We are talking League of Legends levels of toxicity. From bullying in-game to the after-game chat being the stuff of nightmares.

Those were the objective drawbacks of DbD. Subjectively:
Playing killer against an even moderately skilled team requires 10 times more effort than playing a survivor against a good killer. While playing solo survivor (i.e. not in a premade) can be frustrating, a killer that has to take several different factors each second into account (survivor placement, palette placement, tile placement, generator placement, generator progress, totem placement if using Hex Perks) while also attempting to mindgame a survivor during a chase, is probably the most stressful time in an online video game I have ever experienced. At the same time, it can be immensely satisfying when you do manage to defeat them. If you fail, you get called "EZ BABY KILLER" or "TRASH" or the ever so lovely "KYS".

Seriously. DO. NOT. BUY. THIS. GAME.

EVER.

Раньше игра была нормальная до тех пор пока не изменили порчу погибель, игра длится очень мало и за маньяка не хочется играть! На красных и фиолетовых рангах вам вряд-ли удастся сделать -4. Однообразие и лично моё мнение, плохие саундтреки за доктора и стрелка. Играть одному не очень и советую в команде, до 30-100ч геймплея вам будет нравится игра а дальше одно и тоже. Но я продолжаю иногда заходить в неё. Покупайте её если хотите оставить хорошие эмоции об этой игре а не на 200-1000ч игры
